TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializerException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when line number information is available for a serialization error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This exception is thrown when the serializer encounters an error. This exception allows the serializer to return information about the location and type of the error.
## Examples The following code example throws a CodeDomSerializerException with an example message and a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma>.
[!CODE [CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception ex, class System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma linePragma) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma> that indicates where the exception occurred.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerException"> class using the specified exception and line information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception ex, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> object from which to extract the context.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerException"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Stores the data that was being used to serialize or deserialize the object that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer"> was serializing or deserializing.
Describes the source and destination of the stream that generated the exception, as well as a means for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerException"> class using the specified serialization data and context.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Stores the data that was being used to serialize or deserialize the object that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer"> was serializing or deserializing.
Describes the source and destination of the stream that generated the exception, as well as a means for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.
Docs.summary: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> object with the parameter name and additional exception information.
Gets or sets the line information for the error associated with this exception.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma> that indicates the line information for the error.
